column5: saw this advertised and wonder if anyone has any experience with it? I would think that outdoor conditions - especially a breeze - would render it useless but would like to hear if people have any experiences - good or bad. thanks, phish
Ya breeze will cause you problems but I hang it in the cabin bedroom right next to my bed and it keep the skeeters away all night....
I don't find the clip on works all that good but have had good results with thermacell on land. Don't find it works great in a boat, especially when there is a breeze.

thanks for the feedback - seems like using this with any wind would be a waste. when we sit out on the deck in a breeze the skeeters seem to hang out in the "lee" (ie: behind your ears) and the odor/or whatever that comes from this clip-on just can't seem to do much if anything. I think I'll save our trip $$ and stick with muskol. phish
